channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 中国江西省商店火灾造成39人死亡、多人被困
item.description: A fire at a street shop in Xinyu City of Jiangxi Province has killed 39 people and injured nine, Chinese state media and the local government said on Wednesday, adding that some people were still trapped.翻译:中国官方媒体和当地政府周三表示，江西省新余市一家街边商店发生火灾，已造成 39 人死亡、9 人受伤，并补充说仍有一些人被困。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国与乌兹别克斯坦建立更紧密的联系，推动铁路路线绕过俄罗斯
item.description: China on Wednesday upgraded its diplomatic ties with Uzbekistan and offered closer cooperation across a range of projects, including a Central Asia railway that would open up a new trade route as shippers shun an existing overland link via Russia.翻译:中国周三升级了与乌兹别克斯坦的外交关系，并在一系列项目上提供了更密切的合作，其中包括一条中亚铁路，该铁路将开辟一条新的贸易路线，因为托运人将避开现有的经由俄罗斯的陆路连接。
item.author: Liz Lee, Ryan Woo

item.title: 锡因过剩而受到束缚，但绿色工业需求有望消除供应
item.description: The potential for a build-up of tin supplies this year is likely to put pressure on prices, but accelerating demand from the energy transition sector, including solar panels and electric vehicles, should support prices in the future.翻译:今年锡供应量增加的可能性可能会给价格带来压力，但太阳能电池板和电动汽车等能源转型行业需求的加速增长应该会支撑未来的价格。
item.author: Pratima Desai

item.title: 印度必须批准 GIFT City 与邻国投资者的上市
item.description: Indian government approval will be needed if a local company with shareholders from neighbouring countries such as China wants to list on exchanges registered in a new financial hub, according to rules issued on Wednesday.翻译:根据周三发布的规定，如果一家拥有中国等邻国股东的当地公司想要在新金融中心注册的交易所上市，则需要获得印度政府的批准。
item.author: Nikunj Ohri, Jayshree Pyasi

item.title: 早盘竞价：提振对脆弱中国的信心
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Dhara Ranasinghe翻译:达拉·拉纳辛格 (Dhara Ranasinghe) 展望美国和全球市场未来一天
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 郑重其事地击败卡林斯卡娅，进入澳网半决赛
item.description: Zheng Qinwen shook off a sluggish start to outclass Russian Anna Kalinskaya 6-7(4) 6-3 6-1 on Wednesday and reach the semi-finals of the Australian Open for the first time where the Chinese 12th seed will take on Ukrainian qualifier Dayana Yastremska.翻译:周三，郑钦文一改开局不利的局面，以6-7(4) 6-3 6-1击败俄罗斯选手安娜·卡林斯卡娅，首次进入澳网半决赛，中国12号种子将迎战乌克兰预选赛选手达亚娜·亚斯特雷姆斯卡。
item.author: Shrivathsa Sridhar

item.title: 梅德韦杰夫奋战澳网半决赛，亚斯特雷姆斯卡巡演
item.description: Daniil Medvedev pounced on the few chances offered up by Hubert Hurkacz to seal a semi-final spot at the Australian Open on Wednesday, while Dayana Yastremska did the new generation proud by reaching the last four of a Grand Slam for the first time.翻译:丹尼尔·梅德韦杰夫抓住了休伯特·胡尔卡奇提供的为数不多的机会，在周三的澳大利亚网球公开赛上锁定了半决赛席位，而达亚娜·亚斯特雷姆斯卡则首次进入大满贯四强，让新一代人感到自豪。
item.author: Shrivathsa Sridhar

item.title: 调查显示更多德国企业离开中国或考虑退出
item.description: The proportion of German firms exiting the Chinese market or considering doing so has more than doubled to 9% in the past four years, according to a survey by the German Chamber of Commerce in China.翻译:中国德国商会的一项调查显示，过去四年，德国企业退出或考虑退出中国市场的比例增加了一倍多，达到 9%。
item.author: Sarah Marsh

item.title: 中国反驳越南对南海争议岛屿的主张
item.description: The Chinese foreign ministry on Wednesday said China's claims to the Paracel and Spratly Islands in the South China Sea were backed by "history" after Vietnam over the weekend repeated it had sufficient evidence to claim sovereignty over the islands.翻译:中国外交部周三表示，中国对南海西沙群岛和南沙群岛的主权主张有“历史”支持，此前越南周末重申有足够证据证明对这些岛屿拥有主权。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国火箭初创公司东方航天融资近8400万美元
item.description: China's private rocket developer Orienspace has raised nearly 600 million yuan ($83.67 million) to fund rocket development, it said on Wednesday, as China's demand for commercial launches of satellites is expected to increase.翻译:中国私营火箭开发商东方航天周三表示，由于中国对卫星商业发射的需求预计将增加，该公司已筹集近 6 亿元人民币（合 8367 万美元）用于火箭开发。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：中国恒大海外债券持有人集团将加入清算申请--消息人士
item.description: A key offshore bondholder group of China Evergrande plans to join a petition to liquidate the developer at a hearing in a Hong Kong court on Monday, two sources with direct knowledge said.翻译:两位直接知情人士称，中国恒大的一个主要离岸债券持有人集团计划在周一香港法院的听证会上加入清算该开发商的请愿书。
item.author: Clare Jim

item.title: 中国提振经济信心的努力失败
item.description: Chinese Premier Li Qiang went to the World Economic Forum in Davos last week with a mission to present a positive image of the economy and schmooze financial elites: "Investing in the Chinese market is not a risk, but an opportunity."翻译:中国总理李强上周出席达沃斯世界经济论坛，其使命是展示中国经济的正面形象并与金融精英进行交流：“投资中国市场不是风险，而是机遇。”
item.author: Joe Cash

item.title: ASML预计美国、荷兰出口规定将使中国销售额下降10-15%
item.description: Dutch computer chip equipment maker ASML said on Wednesday it expected new U.S. and Dutch export curbs to reduce sales of its "DUV" product lines to China by about 10% to 15% this year, after they hit record levels in 2023.翻译:荷兰计算机芯片设备制造商ASML周三表示，预计美国和荷兰新的出口限制措施将使其“DUV”产品线今年对中国的销量减少约10%至15%，此前这些产品在2023年创下历史新高。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 即时观点：中国央行采取行动支持市场和经济
item.description: China's central bank will cut the amount of cash that banks must hold as reserves from Feb. 5, governor Pan Gongsheng said on Wednesday, the first such cut for the year as policymakers extend efforts to shore up a fragile economic recovery.翻译:周三，中国央行行长潘功胜表示，中国央行将从 2 月 5 日起削减银行必须持有的现金准备金数额，这是政策制定者加大力度支撑脆弱的经济复苏之际今年的首次削减。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国承诺提振市场情绪，富时 100 指数上涨，易捷航空攀升
item.description: The UK's blue-chip index rose on Wednesday, buoyed by China-exposed stocks following measures taken by the central bank to support the economy, while shares in Easyjet surged after the airline forecast a smaller loss.翻译:英国蓝筹股指数周三上涨，受到央行采取措施支持经济后中国股市的提振，而易捷航空 (Easyjet) 预计亏损较小，股价飙升。
item.author: Sruthi Shankar

item.title: 欧洲股市因乐观的科技盈利和中国银行援助而上涨
item.description: European shares moved higher on Wednesday, boosted by technology stocks after software firm SAP and chip-making equipment maker ASML Holding posted strong earnings, while fresh stimulus from China's central bank further aided sentiment.翻译:软件公司 SAP 和芯片制造设备制造商 ASML Holding 公布强劲盈利后，欧洲股市周三走高，受到科技股的提振，而中国央行的新刺激措施进一步提振了市场情绪。
item.author: Shristi A

item.title: 中国削减银行准备金以捍卫市场、刺激增长
item.description: China's central bank announced a deep cut to bank reserves on Wednesday, in a move that will inject about $140 billion of cash into the banking system and send a strong signal of support for a fragile economy and plunging stock markets.翻译:中国央行周三宣布大幅削减银行准备金，此举将向银行体系注入约1400亿美元现金，并发出支持脆弱经济和暴跌股市的强烈信号。
item.author: Kevin Yao, Ellen Zhang

item.title: 诺基亚与中国 Oppo 通过交叉许可协议解决纠纷
item.description: Finnish telecom gear maker Nokia said on Wednesday it had signed a 5G patent cross-licensing deal with Chinese device maker Oppo that resolves patent litigation between the companies.翻译:芬兰电信设备制造商诺基亚周三表示，已与中国设备制造商 Oppo 签署了 5G 专利交叉许可协议，解决了两家公司之间的专利诉讼。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着中国电动汽车竞争加剧，日本电产下调盈利预测
item.description: Japanese electric motor maker Nidec Corp slashed its full-year operating profit forecast by nearly a fifth on Wednesday, warning of uncertainty in demand and intensifying price competition in China's electric vehicle market.翻译:日本电机制造商日本电产株式会社周三将全年营业利润预期下调近五分之一，警告中国电动汽车市场的需求不确定性和价格竞争加剧。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国宣布刺激措施，油价稳定在 80 美元附近
item.description: Oil steadied on Wednesday, with Brent trading near $80 a barrel, as a Chinese economic stimulus package and geopolitical tensions were offset by concerns over tepid demand and a stronger dollar.翻译:周三油价企稳，布伦特原油价格接近每桶 80 美元，因需求不温不火和美元走强的担忧抵消了中国经济刺激计划和地缘政治紧张局势的影响。
item.author: Ahmad Ghaddar
